mapper.select: select p.POSITION_NAME name,count(e.POSITION_ID) value from HR_POSITION p left join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.POSITION_ID=p.POSITION_ID group by e.POSITION_ID,p.POSITION_ID,p.POSITION_NAME
select b.OBJECT_TEXT name,count(e.DEGREE) value from T_S_BASECODE b left join HR_EMPLOYEE e on b.OBJECT_VALUE=e.DEGREE where b.PARENTID=4 group by e.DEGREE,b.OBJECT_VALUE,b.OBJECT_TEXT

select s.NAME DataAxis, t.[COUNT] Data from (select c.COMPANY_ID,count(e.COMPANY_ID) [COUNT] from HR_COMPANY c left join HR_EMPLOYEE e on c.COMPANY_ID=e.COMPANY_ID group by e.COMPANY_ID,c.COMPANY_ID) t inner join HR_COMPANY s on t.COMPANY_ID=s.COMPANY_ID order by t.COUNT desc

select b.PAY_MONTH DataAxis,sum(a.PAY_VALUE) Data from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE a INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_PAY b on a.PAY_ID=b.PAY_ID where a.ITEM_ID in (4,5) and b.PAY_MONTH>=CONVERT(varchar(100),dateadd(MONTH,-13,GETDATE()), 23) group by b.PAY_MONTH

select b.PAY_MONTH DataAxis,sum(a.PAY_VALUE) Data from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE a INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_PAY b on a.PAY_ID=b.PAY_ID where a.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111) and b.PAY_MONTH>=CONVERT(varchar(100),dateadd(MONTH,-13,GETDATE()), 23) group by b.PAY_MONTH

select b.PAY_MONTH DataAxis,sum(a.PAY_VALUE) Data from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE a INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_PAY b on a.PAY_ID=b.PAY_ID where a.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,206) and b.PAY_MONTH>=CONVERT(varchar(100),dateadd(MONTH,-13,GETDATE()), 23) group by b.PAY_MONTH

select b.PAY_MONTH DataAxis,sum(a.PAY_VALUE) Data from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE a INNER JOIN HR_SALARY_PAY b on a.PAY_ID=b.PAY_ID where a.ITEM_ID in (6) and b.PAY_MONTH>=CONVERT(varchar(100),dateadd(MONTH,-13,GETDATE()), 23) group by b.PAY_MONTH
